title: Manual QA Testing (4 Shipped Features)
description: Execute manual QA for 4 shipped onboarding features: BL-073 (Stat Tooltips), BL-071 (Variant Tooltips), BL-068 (Counter Chart), BL-070 (Melee Transition). Test plan includes screen readers (NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver), cross-browser (Chrome/Safari/Firefox/Edge), touch devices (iOS/Android), accessibility (WCAG AAA), responsive layouts (320px-1920px). Cannot be automated by AI agent — requires human tester. Acceptance: All 4 features verified across 3 browsers, 2 screen readers, 1 mobile device. Zero accessibility issues.

title: Variant-Specific Balance Sweep (Aggressive/Defensive Optimization)
description: Systematically optimize balance for aggressive and defensive gear variants independently. Run high-precision sims (N=500) at bare/uncommon/epic/giga tiers for all 3 variants. Identify worst archetype per variant/tier. Propose small stat tweaks (±1-3 points) if needed to tighten spreads. Acceptance: spreads <8pp all variants all tiers, zero flags (<42% or >58%), analysis doc with tables and proposed changes (if any).

title: Variant Interaction Unit Tests (Rare/Epic/Giga Coverage)
description: Add deterministic unit tests for variant-specific matchups flagged by BL-079. For each variant/tier combination with imbalance (e.g., 'Aggressive Giga: Breaker 58.2%'), add 1 test (3-round matchup) covering carryover+softCap+fatigue pipeline. Target 8-12 new tests across all 3 variants at rare/epic/giga. Acceptance: 8-12 tests in gear-variants.test.ts, all 908+ tests passing, tests cover 2+ tiers, test data matches BL-079 win rate expectations.

title: Post-MVP Design Spec: Archetype Feel & Identity
description: Design specs for deepening archetype identity in Phase 2. For each archetype: define identity statement (what makes it special), identify 2-3 signature strategies (Charger unseats early, Bulwark turtles, etc.), propose teaching approach for each. Optional: propose new mechanics that reinforce identity (no balance impact). Acceptance: 6 archetype specs with identity+strategies+teaching, no balance changes proposed, document in orchestrator/analysis/bl-082-archetype-identity.md, ready for Phase 2 implementation.

title: Legendary/Relic Tier Deep Dive (N=500 High-Precision Simulation)
description: Ultra-high precision analysis of legendary/relic tiers at N=500 matches per matchup. Run sims for legendary (N=500, balanced variant) and relic (N=500, balanced variant). Analyze 36-archetype matchups at each tier. Identify patterns: which archetypes scale best with rarity, does balance improve/degrade at ultra-high tiers, are there tier-specific imbalances. Create analysis tables + findings. Acceptance: 36-matchup table legendary, 36-matchup table relic, tier progression analysis (bare→legendary→relic), recommendations for Phase 2 work (if any), document in orchestrator/analysis/bl-083-ultra-high-tier.md.
